Voice Translator v1.0.0

A simple and easy-to-use multilingual voice translation app that supports real-time translation between Chinese, English, Japanese and Korean.

autoPlay.title: Auto-Play Settings
autoPlay.infoMessage:
â€¢ Auto-play voice translation: Automatically plays translation result after voice translation
â€¢ Auto-play text translation: Automatically reads translation result after text translation
â€¢ Both features can be enabled or disabled independently
autoPlay.voiceDescription: Automatically plays translation result after voice translation
autoPlay.textDescription: Automatically reads translation result after text translation
autoPlay.statusBoth: Will play voice and text translation results
